title: Pick a Sales Order
description: A warehouse operator is assigned a sales order and must pick the correct items and quantities from their storage locations.

tasks.description: Retrieve the next assigned picking task from the Warehouse Management System (WMS).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly retrieves the picking list for a specific sales order.

tasks.description: Navigate to the first location, scan the location barcode to confirm, and then scan the item and enter the picked quantity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly confirms the location and records the pick for the first item.

tasks.description: Repeat the picking process for all items on the list and deliver the completed tote to the packing station.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully picks all items and updates the task status to 'Picked'.
